alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 8:15PM CDT until July 05 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR CHICKASAW COUNTY... At 815 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Riceville to near Nashua, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Fredericksburg around 840 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bradford, Chickasaw, New Hampton Airport, County Roads B 28 And V 18, Republic, Highway 18 And County V 18 and County Roads V 56 And B 33. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
